Card Game - Cucu.  40 cards - 2 each of a numerical series from 1 to 10 in black and 2 of the following picture cards - fool, gorgon, bucket, nothing, nulla, taverna, cat, horse, bravo and cuckoo (cucu); single card of a rampant lion holding a shield with "dilittevole giuoco dell chuchu.  Printed in colors.  Back: blue on white with central rosette.  Made by Guglielmo Murari
creator: Guglielmo Murari
